Ninety9 Bottles

I teamed up with the guys at Chippendale Cellars to launch an online wine company called Ninety9 Bottles.

Ninety9 Bottles consists of an online wine store that sells a variety of wines including an exclusive range of Ninety9 Bottles branded wines I hand-selected and desgined.

Andy Clarke had just released Hardboiled Web Design which inspired me to design and develop my first responsive website.

In addition to the branding and website, we also created a monthly specials email and a series of spin papers to accompany the quarterly dozen packs.
